docs.title: Home
docs.text: Welcome to the API documentation for LuaUtils!

docs.title: About
docs.text: Transforms a table containing lua objects (number, string, boolean, table, etc...) into a string.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Returns a string version of the table passed in valid lua/luau syntax. 

function SerializeTable(Table: {any}, ForceDictionaryLayout: boolean?, Beautify: boolean?): string
